conbody.p:
The summary of a Controller Node (CNx) or Storage Node (SNx) displays the following information:
BIOS: brand name of the BIOS software
IP Address: list of IP addresses of the node
Motherboard: name and type of the motherboard
CPU: model of CPU in the Controller
Memory: type of RAM
Network: name and type of network interfaces The full inventory of a Controller or Storage Node can be found in the inventory table.
